mapper.select: SELECT /* com.ohgiraffers.thymeleafspringboot.notice.dao.NoticeMapper#selectAllNoticeList() */ A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.NOTICE_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.ohgiraffers.thymeleafspringboot.notice.dao.NoticeMapper#incrementNoticeCount() */ TBL_NOTICE SET NOTICE_COUNT = NOTICE_NO + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{ no }
mapper.select: SELECT /* com.ohgiraffers.thymeleafspringboot.notice.dao.NoticeMapper#selectNoticeDetail() */ A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = #{ no }
